<p>The weak law of large numbers states, that for a given sequence of random numbers $\bar{X}_n$,</p>

<div class="formula">
$\lim\limits_{n \rightarrow \infty}{P(| \bar{X}_n - \mu | \gt \varepsilon)} = 0 \;$
where
$\; \mu = E(X) \;$ 
and
$\; \bar{X}_n = \frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^n X_i.$
</div>
